name: Multiple Forum Width Adjuster
description: Changes the width of The Fanfiction Forum. Currently set to 50% min-width and 75% max-width, it can be adjusted to whichever percentage you want just below. Credit to acebrain01 for his DLP Wide which inspired me to make this. [DISCONTINUED]
additional_info:
Version 2.0.0 - Added custom width option and made it for multiple forums. Forums Covered
  1. The Fanfiction Forum
  2. Dark Lord Potter
  3. Space Battles
  4. Beast's Lair
  5. Questionable Questing
  6. Sufficient Velocity
  7. All InvisionFree Forums (w/o custom domain names)
